SELECT d.CD_DEDUCT AS "cdDeduct" , (SELECT s.NM_DEDUCT FROM SADEDUCT s WHERE s.CD_DEDUCT = d.CD_DEDUCT) AS "nmDeduct" , TO_CHAR(sum(p.ALLOW_PAY)) AS "sumDeductPay" FROM SADEDUCT d LEFT OUTER JOIN SADEDUCTPAY p ON p.CD_DEDUCT = d.CD_DEDUCT LEFT OUTER JOIN "DATE" d ON p.DATE_ID = d.DATE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN EMP e ON e.CD_EMP = p.CD_EMP
AND D."DATE" = (SELECT "DATE" FROM "DATE" WHERE date_id = #{dateId})
AND e.DA_RETIRE < (SELECT "DATE" FROM "DATE" WHERE date_id = #{dateId})
AND d."MONTH" = (SELECT "MONTH" FROM "DATE" WHERE date_id = #{dateId})
AND TO_DATE(e.DA_RETIRE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_DATE((SELECT "MONTH" FROM "DATE" WHERE date_id = #{dateId}), 'YYYY-MM')
AND d.ALLOW_YEAR = (SELECT "ALLOW_YEAR" FROM "DATE" WHERE date_id = #{dateId})
AND TO_DATE(e.DA_RETIRE, 'YYYY') < TO_DATE((SELECT "ALLOW_YEAR" FROM "DATE" WHERE date_id = #{dateId}), 'YYYY')
GROUP BY d.CD_DEDUCT
SELECT CD_DEDUCT AS "cdDeduct", NM_DEDUCT AS "nmDeduct", YN_BONUS AS "ynBonus", YN_SAL AS "ynSal" FROM SADEDUCT ORDER BY NM_DEDUCT
